subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A day that began with optimism ended with the Yankees’ Derek Jeter undergoing an M.R.I. and the Dodgers’ first-half sensation, Yasiel Puig, left out of the All-Star Game.
snippet: A day that began with optimism ended with the Yankees’ Derek Jeter undergoing an M.R.I. and the Dodgers’ first-half sensation, Yasiel Puig, left out of the All-Star Game.
